columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each daily settlement summary record

columns.name: partner_source_id
columns.description: Identifier for the partner source (e.g., 4 for WORLDPAY, 6 for GLOBALPAYMENT, 2 for STRIPE)

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date of the settlement summary

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month of the settlement summary (1-12)

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year of the settlement summary

columns.name: sum_settlement
columns.description: The total amount settled for the day

columns.name: count_settlement
columns.description: The number of settlements processed for the day

columns.name: ledger_account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the associated ledger account

columns.name: institution_account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the associated bank institution account

columns.name: partner_account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the partner's account

columns.name: partner_source
columns.description: Name of the partner source (e.g., WORLDPAY, GLOBALPAYMENT, STRIPE)

columns.name: live_connection
columns.description: Indicates if this is a live connection or test/sandbox environment

columns.name: sum_settlement_currency
columns.description: The currency of the settled amount

settlement_summary_daily.description: This table has settlement summary at a daily aggregation level

columns.name: ledger_account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the ledger account

columns.name: settlement_id
columns.description: Identifier for the associated settlement

ledger_account_relation_settlement.description: This table is a relationship table between ledger_account_id and settlement_id

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of the settlement

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Timestamp of when the settlement was last modified

columns.name: scheduled
columns.description: Indicates if the settlement was scheduled

columns.name: partner_account_connection_id
columns.description: Identifier for the partner account connection

columns.name: partner_source_id
columns.description: Identifier for the partner source (e.g., 4 for WORLDPAY, 6 for GLOBALPAYMENT, 2 for STRIPE)

columns.name: partner_created_date
columns.description: Timestamp of when the settlement was created by the partner

columns.name: funds_available_date
columns.description: Timestamp of when the funds will be available

columns.name: funding_account
columns.description: The account used for funding the settlement

columns.name: method
columns.description: The method used for settlement (e.g., ACH, wire transfer)

columns.name: object
columns.description: The type of object this settlement represents

columns.name: partner_environment_mode
columns.description: Indicates if this is a LIVE or TEST environment for the partner

columns.name: related_original_settlement
columns.description: Reference to the original settlement if this is a related transaction

columns.name: related_reversed_by_settlement
columns.description: Reference to the settlement that reversed this one, if applicable

columns.name: related_settlement_exception_transaction
columns.description: Reference to any exception transaction related to this settlement

columns.name: settlement_exception_code
columns.description: Code indicating any exception that occurred during settlement

columns.name: source_original_settlement
columns.description: Source of the original settlement if this is a related transaction

columns.name: source_reversed_by_settlement
columns.description: Source of the settlement that reversed this one, if applicable

columns.name: source_settlement_exception_transaction
columns.description: Source of any exception transaction related to this settlement

columns.name: source_transaction_id
columns.description: Identifier for the source transaction

columns.name: statement_narrative
columns.description: Narrative description of the settlement for statements

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the settlement (e.g., pending, completed, failed)

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the settlement

columns.name: string_partner_created_date
columns.description: String representation of the settlement

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the account associated with this settlement

columns.name: live_connection
columns.description: Indicates if this is a live connection or TEST/LIVE environment

columns.name: partner_source
columns.description: Name of the partner source (e.g., WORLDPAY, GLOBALPAYMENT, STRIPE)

columns.name: record_state
columns.description: The current state of this record (e.g., active, archived)

columns.name: source_id
columns.description: unique Identifier for deduplication

columns.name: currency
columns.description: The currency of the settlement amount

settlement.description: This table has detailed settlement data
